turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello Assistant!! Can you here me? Have you arrived to work yet? Can I ask you to pick me up something for Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes sir how are you doing this morning?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm doing good but I'm going to be late to the office. Can you run to the starbucks in down on Main Street Paterson to get a couple hot drinks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes of course, I'm actually there now what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please get me a Viente Caffe Mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I'm in line with the cashier they would like to know if you would like whip cream on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes of course extra if they can!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They said yes of course any other specifications?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please add two sugars to drink and mini chocolate bars.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: They can accommodate just fine. Anything else

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Uhhhhh.... Yes! Let's get the secretary something drink make her day better!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK! what do you think she would like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just get her a small cappuccino she doesn't like anything fancy and she isn't picky.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok I'll add that to the order!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Would you like anything? It's on me of course!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes!!! Thank you for asking??

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll just get a small espresso and then I'll head out of here to the office!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Get yourself a veinte!!! You deserve it!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Why thanks boss you are the best!!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No you are!!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order is almost ready they have the card on file. I'm getting a good container to keep in it in then heading to the office!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great see you soon!
